name: Anshul Sharma
about: Committed to continuous experimentation, measurement, and learning to rapidly iterate and improve. Always exploring new ways technology can solve problems and create value. Thrives on working with cross-functional teams. Adept at leveraging data, analytics, and emerging technologies to build new tools for users.

experience.title: Analyst (Stat Forecasting)
experience.description: - Awarded the annual Star Debutante honor for outstanding impact, performance, and contributions as a new joiner- Conceptualized and developed Forecast Master, an innovative R Shiny application deployed on GCP, streamlining time-series analysis, forecasting, and model fine-tuning, reducing 20 man-hours per month for each team member- Developed an Anomaly Detection tool using Python Dash, enabling users to upload and analyze data for anomalies, perform EDA, implementing effective anomaly detection and correction- Led the monthly forecasting cycle for raw materials required for the international business demand & inventory planning
experience.description_html: - Awarded the annual Star Debutante honor for outstanding impact, performance, and contributions as a new joiner- Conceptualized and developed Forecast Master, an innovative R Shiny application deployed on GCP, streamlining time-series analysis, forecasting, and model fine-tuning, reducing 20 man-hours per month for each team member- Developed an Anomaly Detection tool using Python Dash, enabling users to upload and analyze data for anomalies, perform EDA, implementing effective anomaly detection and correction- Led the monthly forecasting cycle for raw materials required for the international business demand & inventory planning

experience.title: Product Developer Intern
experience.description: - Integrated Google Speech & Translate API into an audio transcription product; expanded capabilities to new markets- Drove 50% conversational improvement by deploying NLP models like BERT; significantly boosted user experience.- Added MP3/OGG compatibility using PyDub library; increased user satisfaction through seamless audio processing- Designed and built MySQL database to store product analytics and feedback; enabled data-driven product planning
experience.description_html: - Integrated Google Speech & Translate API into an audio transcription product; expanded capabilities to new markets- Drove 50% conversational improvement by deploying NLP models like BERT; significantly boosted user experience.- Added MP3/OGG compatibility using PyDub library; increased user satisfaction through seamless audio processing- Designed and built MySQL database to store product analytics and feedback; enabled data-driven product planning <!---->

experience.title: Business Analyst Intern
experience.description: - Leveraged image classification model to tag 92% of apparel products automatically, improving catalog organization- Uncovered 8 key retail performance indicators; designed interactive dashboards to monitor and optimize operations- Automated quarterly performance reports, saving 30+ weekly man-hours; enabled efficient monitoring of franchise stores
experience.description_html: - Leveraged image classification model to tag 92% of apparel products automatically, improving catalog organization- Uncovered 8 key retail performance indicators; designed interactive dashboards to monitor and optimize operations- Automated quarterly performance reports, saving 30+ weekly man-hours; enabled efficient monitoring of franchise stores <!---->

experience.title: Product Operations Intern
experience.description: - Managed user engagement initiatives including thorough POC operations, increasing messages sent per user by 41%- Improved platform KPIs including 6% increase in community visit to chat view ratio and 3% lift in chat send retention- Conducted in-depth 35 user interviews to uncover adoption barriers; proposed targeted solutions to increase engagement
experience.description_html: - Managed user engagement initiatives including thorough POC operations, increasing messages sent per user by 41%- Improved platform KPIs including 6% increase in community visit to chat view ratio and 3% lift in chat send retention- Conducted in-depth 35 user interviews to uncover adoption barriers; proposed targeted solutions to increase engagement <!---->

experience.title: Deep Learning Research Intern
experience.description: - Researched deep learning models for satellite image segmentation of buildings; demonstrated computer vision expertise- Experimented with generative adversarial networks in PyTorch; gained hands-on expertise in deep learning frameworks- Developed U-Net, ResU-Net and PatchGAN models for image segmentation; skills directly applicable to computer vision- Extracted Land Surface Temperature data using Tiff files, trained a Neural Net to predict LST with R2 Score of 0.62
experience.description_html: - Researched deep learning models for satellite image segmentation of buildings; demonstrated computer vision expertise- Experimented with generative adversarial networks in PyTorch; gained hands-on expertise in deep learning frameworks- Developed U-Net, ResU-Net and PatchGAN models for image segmentation; skills directly applicable to computer vision- Extracted Land Surface Temperature data using Tiff files, trained a Neural Net to predict LST with R2 Score of 0.62 <!---->

experience.title: First Runner Up | Battlefield | Business Analytics Competition
experience.description: - Participated in a team to secure 2nd position among 818 teams at the national level final round in a multi-stage competition- Trained SVM, Random Forests, and Neural Nets to predict the probability of candidate acquisition with the F1 Score of 0.72- Conducted Data Cleaning and Manipulation, conceptualized a Voting Classifier to increase the final F1 Score by 22.5%
experience.description_html: - Participated in a team to secure 2nd position among 818 teams at the national level final round in a multi-stage competition- Trained SVM, Random Forests, and Neural Nets to predict the probability of candidate acquisition with the F1 Score of 0.72- Conducted Data Cleaning and Manipulation, conceptualized a Voting Classifier to increase the final F1 Score by 22.5% <!---->

experience.title: Open Source Contributor @ Kharagpur Winter of Code 2020
experience.description: Project Title: Algorithmic Bias in Deep Learning Models- Conceived a Dense Neural Net with 11 layers with a Dropout of 30% to predict Income Category with an Accuracy of 82%- Generated Heat Maps based on each network layer's output using the Layerwise Relevance Propagation technique- Executed an ablation study with various architectures & hyper-parameters to increase the accuracy of the model by 4.9%
experience.description_html: Project Title: Algorithmic Bias in Deep Learning Models- Conceived a Dense Neural Net with 11 layers with a Dropout of 30% to predict Income Category with an Accuracy of 82%- Generated Heat Maps based on each network layer's output using the Layerwise Relevance Propagation technique- Executed an ablation study with various architectures & hyper-parameters to increase the accuracy of the model by 4.9% <!---->

projects: [{"title":"COVID-19 Detection Using Deep Learning","start_date":"Nov 2020","end_date":"Nov 2020","description":"Worked on implementation of Deep Learning techniques to distinguish COVID-19 and Pneumonia from a set of Chest X-ray Images. Trained a 9 layered Convolutional Neural Network with Dense Layers and used Regularization techniques such as Dropout, Batch Normalization and Max Pooling combined with RELU Activation function. Achieved an Accuracy Score of 94.84% on the test data. Technology used: PyTorch."},{"title":"Image Super Resolution Using CNN","start_date":"Oct 2020","end_date":"Oct 2020","description":"Implemented a Convolutional neural network model to generate high resolution images from low resolution ones. Optimized the model using Adam, padding and Bicubic interpolation to increase Average Peak Signal to Noise ratio by 1.1% compared to SRCNN. Made a command line application to make the training and testing process easier. Technologies used: PyTorch, Click & PIL."},{"title":"Pulsar detection using Ensemble Learning","start_date":"Aug 2020","end_date":"Aug 2020","description":"Developed a Machine Learning model to distinguish Pulsar Stars from radio-frequency interference and normal stars. An ensemble model was trained using Random Forests, Support Vector Machines and Adaptive Boosting Algorithms on a highly imbalanced dataset corrected through Synthetic Minority Oversampling Technique. Achieved 97% precision score, 91% recall and 96% accuracy. Technologies used : Scikit-Learn."},{"title":"Twimage","start_date":"Aug 2020","end_date":"Aug 2020","description":"Twimage is a Python package that can scrap the trending section of Twitter for Hashtags. It can further download images shared under the thread. It can be used as an image data set generator for applying machine learning models for research."}]
